cookies_policy.title: Cookies Editor
cookies_policy.message: Welcome to {{siteOwner}} site. On this site we use cookies to better understand our audience. If you want to know more about the way we use cookies,
cookies_policy.privacy_policy_msg: we invite you to please visit our web page of
cookies_policy.functionals_content: They are necessary to correctly display the section of our services on our website and guarantee the proper functioning of our site. Without them our services section can NOT function correctly.
cookies_policy.essentials_content: These are the cookies that are essential and strictly necessary for proper functioning, such as those that serve to restrict access to certain areas of the website where it can only be accessed by means of a key or password.
cookies_policy.analytics_content: They are used to create browsing profiles and to know the preferences of its users in order to improve the offer of products and services. Without them, we can't know what content is most valued or how often unique visitors return to the site, making it difficult to improve the information we offer you.
